title: BRIEF-Pursuit Minerals Updates On Intention To Seek Partner For Assistance With Vanadium Projects
text:
BRIEF-Pursuit Minerals Updates On Intention To Seek Partner For Assistance With Vanadium Projects

Commodities 35 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 18:50)

BRIEF-Pursuit Minerals Updates On Intention To Seek Partner For Assistance With Vanadium Projects Sept 13 (Reuters) - Pursuit Minerals Ltd : * UPDATES ON INTENTION TO SEEK STRATEGIC PARTNER TO ASSIST TO PROGRESS AIRIJOKI & KOITELAINEN PROJECTS TO NEXT STAGES OF DEVELOPMENT * CONTINUING TALKS WITH SEVERAL POTENTIAL PARTNERS TO ASSIST CO IN BUILDING LONG-TERM, SUSTAINABLE VANADIUM BUSINESS

BRIEF-Pursuit Minerals Updates On Intention To Seek Partner For Assistance With Vanadium Projects
